bibl.title: Roman Alexandria from the Perspective of the Papyri.

series.title: Centre for Hellenic Studies. King's College London. Publications.

bibl.note: [Introduction.] - 1. Boundaries of status and law. - 2. The lure of the city. - 3. Alexandrians at large. - 4. Records of heroic Alexandrians. - 5. Caracalla: between Alexandrians and Egyptians. - References.

Anthony HIRST and Michael SILK (Edd.), Alexandria, Real and Imagined = Centre for Hellenic Studies. King's College London. Publications. 5 (Aldershot, 2004) pp. 79-111.
